Perceptor/Underground/Scorpyo::

The shuttle with Perceptor and co. was arriving when they saw 
Maximals's shuttle (Special circuits advice Perceptor, remember he's 
Blind). "Open FIRE!!!!!" screamed Perceptor. The shuttle shot 25 times

Chamaleon/Charon/Deepfear/Sharpclaws.

Sharpclaws had arrived when other shuttle was ready. Sharpclaws, 
charon and Deepfear was inside. The shutle left the base.
